recommended_degree: Teknik Industri, Teknik Mesin, Teknik Elektro (Sarjana)
job_description:
Join us as a Production Planning Intern and support the production team in ensuring smooth and efficient daily operations. In this role, you will:

1. Monitor production schedules created by the planner.
2. Coordinate with production leaders to ensure schedules are followed.
3. Check the completeness of parts and materials before the assembly process starts.
4. Report daily production status, targets, and any issues that arise during the process.

This position is ideal for graduates who want to learn how planning, coordination, and real-time problem-solving work in a manufacturing environment.
